alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Beaverhead County through 700 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Wisdom to 8 miles southeast of Lima. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Lima, Jackson, Monida, Wisdom, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Bannack, Snowline, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Polaris, Clark Canyon, Bannack State Park and Monida Pass. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 72 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may lead to localized minor flooding and possibly some debris flow down steep slopes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with some of these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
